Title: Establishes "The Equity in Fertility Treatment Act"; relates to the definition of infertility and health insurance coverage for the treatment of infertility
Summary: Establishes "The Equity in Fertility Treatment Act"; relates to the definition of infertility and health insurance coverage for the treatment of infertility.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to the definition of infertility and health insurance coverage for in-vitro fertilization
